jobDescription: Develop, characterize, and scale the methods powering our flagship materials informatics platform. Applied scientists work at the intersection of materials domain expertise, machine learning/statistics/applied mathematics, and software engineering to identify foundational challenges and opportunities, develop technological solutions on top of known or novel methodologies, and characterize the performance and efficiency of those technologies on commercially relevant projects. Applied scientists are expected to work particularly closely with data scientists and software engineers while providing broad technical expertise company-wide.
